Delete:
always @(posedge clk) begin
  if (resetn == 1'b0) begin
    enabled <= 1'b0;
  end else if (enable == 1'b1) begin
      enabled <= 1'b1;
  end else if (request_id == id) begin
end
Add:
always @(posedge clk) begin
    if (resetn == 1'b0) begin
    end else if (enable == 1'b1) begin
        enabled <= 1'b1;
    end else if (request_id == id) begin
        enabled <= 1'b0;
    end
